name: request-gb
description: simplified HTTP client with automatic Chinese encoding conversion

scripts.test-travis: node node_modules/istanbul-harmony/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -u exports --require should  --timeout 50000  --recursive test/ --bail
